short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows you to listen to the Anchor Radio in the background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to the Anchor Radio in your browser while you do other things. Open the extension to see the current and coming-up song. You may also add the currently playing song to your favorite's list in the Anchor Radio App.
